settings.title: Find Your Trueform – A Spa for Every Fit
settings.content: Life is different for us all, so choosing the right spa pool to compliment the way you live is essential to gaining the most out of it, every day. Whether you’re looking to sit back and quietly recharge mind, body and soul, or bring the whole family together for company and conversation – or both, there’s a Trueform spa pool specific to your wants and needs. Find your spa pool style in the Trueform family.

settings.title: Warranty Guarantee
settings.content: All spa pools come with a five-year warranty against manufacturer defects and our pumps and heaters are covered by a two-year warranty. Replacement parts and repairs are available in New Zealand and worldwide.

settings.html: Browse the range of our most popular spa pools below and if these don’t suit your needs, we have a huge selection of other styles available to choose from – just reach out to your local Palmers stockists for more details and let us help to choose the perfect spa for you.

settings.title: Storm
settings.content:
PERSON: 2-3
JETS: 15, 17, 19, 21 & 2
LITRES: 700
DIMENSIONS: 1800 x 1800 x 785

Take relaxation to the next level:
The best sort of storm you want to get stuck in. Featuring one recliner and two seats, the Storm Trueform spa pool wont rip through your fences but it will help ease your everyday aches and pains.

• 1 Recliner + 2 Seats
• Moulded Padded Headrests
• Digital multi-colour lighting
• Digital Touchpad Control

*Spa pools are available to purchase from Palmers St James, Palmers Bethlehem, Palmers Rotorua and Palmers Plimmerton, who are all proud to be local Spa Pool Specialist Dealers.

settings.title: Wanaka
settings.content:
PERSON: 5
JETS: 14 & 23
LITRES: 1000
DIMENSIONS: 2020 x 2020 x 760

The perfect family retreat. Space for the kids but still room to unwind for mum and dad, now everyone gets their wish:
When you’re aiming to keep everyone happy, direct all thoughts to the Wanaka Trueform spa pool. Comfortably seating five people, with 23 jets, you can converse, laugh and kickback with space for all.

• 2 Recliners + 3 Seats
• Moulded Padded Headrests
• Digital multi-colour lighting
• Digital Touchpad Control

*Spa pools are available to purchase from Palmers St James, Palmers Bethlehem, Palmers Rotorua and Palmers Plimmerton, who are all proud to be local Spa Pool Specialist Dealers.

The Chairman Trueform spa pool strikes a balance between style and price – no compromises here. With seven colour options to choose from, and 23 jets to relax into, the best seat in the house is right here.

settings.title: Miami

PERSON: 5
JETS: 28 & 40
LITRES: 1150
DIMENSIONS: 2090 x 2090 x 890

For those craving relaxation and body recharge, all wrapped up in style:
Wave goodbye to those body aches and pains once and for all! Jump into the Miami Trueform spa pool at the end of a busy day and let the 28 massage jets work wonders for mind and body.

Bring the family together and share in some memory making:
Turn off the technology and embrace real time to unwind – tell stories and enjoy a few good laughs. The Family Deluxe Trueform spa pool has room to move, breathe and just be!
